name: Knockback Mania
description: Hey Gamers! This is a beta version of this game non of it is done yet so dont judge lol, in this game you could wall run buy going beside a wall and hold "A" or "D" on your keyboard depending on which side the wall is to you there are some enemies that dont do anything yet but you can just hit them with your gun off the map for now,  if you ever get stuck or fall off the map or encounter a glitch just press "F" on your keyboard and it will reset the game,   so have fun AND PLS PLAY MY GAME XD
